trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of stop bits used on the <xref href="System.IO.Ports.SerialPort"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Angir antallet stoppbiter brukes på den <xref href="System.IO.Ports.SerialPort"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: You use this enumeration when setting the value of the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.StopBits%2A> property on the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> class.
trans-unit.target: Du bruker denne opplisting ved angivelse av verdien for <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.StopBits%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>klassen.</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> </xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.StopBits%2A>

trans-unit.source: Stop bits separate each unit of data on an asynchronous serial connection.
trans-unit.target: Stoppbiter Skill hver enhet av data på en asynkron seriell tilkobling.

trans-unit.source: They are also sent continuously when no data is available for transmission.
trans-unit.target: De sendes også kontinuerlig når ingen data er tilgjengelig for overføring.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> class throws an <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException> exception when you set the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.StopBits%2A> property to None.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>klasse kaster en <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>unntak når du angir den <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.StopBits%2A>egenskapen til None.</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.StopBits%2A> </xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException> </xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>

trans-unit.source: This value is not supported by the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.StopBits*> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien støttes ikke av den <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.StopBits*>egenskapen.</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.StopBits*>
